alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 8:51AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN OCEAN... SOUTHEASTERN MERCER...NORTH CENTRAL BURLINGTON...SOUTHWESTERN MONMOUTH AND SOUTH CENTRAL MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 851 AM EST, a snow shower was located over Windsor, or 7 miles east of Trenton, moving east at 25 mph. Light snow may accumulate on bridges and overpasses and other elevated surfaces, creating slippery conditions. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Jackson, Manalapan, Hightstown, Bordentown, Cranbury, Lakehurst, Allentown, Roosevelt, Windsor, Six Flags Theme Park, Jacksons Mills, West Freehold, Cassville, Adelphia, Clarksburg, Vista Center, Edinburg, Crosswicks, and White Horse. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 7 and 8A. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 27. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 56 and 67. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Western Monmouth
